question: Which color scheme involves the use of different tints, shades, and intensities of ONE color?<image 1>
options: ['Analogous Color Scheme', 'Complementary Color Scheme', 'Monochromatic Color Scheme', 'Triadic Color Scheme']
description: The image depicts a close-up view of a flower with petals in various shades of purple. The petals exhibit different tints, shades, and intensities of the same color, ranging from light lavender to deep violet. The center of the flower has some green elements, but the overall focus is on the purple hues of the petals.
